name: polaris
description: Polaris is a self-hosted music streaming server with a sleek web UI. It serves Music library content over the browser or app and supports playlists, search, and metadata.
features: Music streaming: Stream your music library to web browsers and mobile devices.
Library organization: Automatically organize music by artist, album, and genre with metadata.
Playlist management: Create and manage playlists for different moods and occasions.
Search functionality: Find songs, albums, and artists quickly with full-text search.
Album artwork: Display album covers and artist images fetched from online databases.
Audio transcoding: Convert audio formats on-the-fly for compatibility with all devices.
User accounts: Create separate accounts for family members with individual libraries and playlists.
Mobile apps: Access your music from iOS and Android devices with native applications.
Random playback: Shuffle songs or albums for variety in listening experience.
Queue management: Build and modify playback queues with drag-and-drop controls.
Offline sync: Download music to mobile devices for offline listening without internet.
Last.fm scrobbling: Track listening history and scrobble plays to Last.fm for statistics.
